root.name: Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend
root.description: Expands the game to the remaining two days of the week.PlotThe expansion takes place after the postal dude wakes up after getting shot in the head only to realize his wife has left him, his trailer has been repossessed, his dog impounded, and he's once again broke. You follow him on his exploits as he tries to just get away from it all and start anew while re-repossessing his trailer, freeing champ, and doing odd jobs to make some loose change. All the while zombies, Al Qaeda, the military, and more protesters are after his head.
